response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for us, estimated at $1,500,000 from your perspective. Given its unique qualities and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,250,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic value, providing you with an exceptional return on investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget, so we may proceed to discuss the details further.", "product_price": 1250000}
